verse.unicode: ਕਹੂੰ ਅੱਛਰਾ ਪੱਛਰਾ ਮੱਛਰਾ ਹੋ ॥

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art the belle of this world, somewhere the apsara (nymph of heaven) and somewhere the beautiful maid of nether-world!

bdb.gurmukhi: ikqy (qusIN) ies lok dI suMdrI, ikqy svrg dI suMdrI Aqy ikqy pwqwl dI suMdrI ho।
